oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Students at Gorine Beauty College, circa 1940s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Black and white group photograph of students of Gorine Beauty College. They are arranged in three rows and flanked by flowers. A sign in the foreground says, "Gorine Beauty College MME.G.S.M. Young, 432 Beale Ave. 8 4972."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Gorine Beauty College
Portrait photographs; Group portraits; African Americans; Women; African Americans--Education--Tennessee--Memphis; Women--Education--Tennessee--Memphis
Memphis (Tenn.)
